Package prog4

Class BuildController

java.lang.Object
prog4.BuildController
public class BuildController
extends java.lang.Object
Controller class for the main order window. Handles mainly adding to the order and configuring the pizza.
Author:
Krushn Gor, Jake Ippolito

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    BuildController()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addTopping()
    Transfer the selected topping from toppingView to selectedView Delete the selected topping from toppingView
    void blockTopping()
    Deluxe, and Hawaiian Pizza are special pizza! Helper method for default error.
    void defaultTopping()
    It uses the value from the pizzaStyleBox The get value will be compared and will set the topping value on Selected View, and Topping View accordingly
    void getMyOrder()
    Will call the method display() in PopOrderWindow class It will pop up a new window!
    void printError​(java.lang.String msg)  
    void removeTopping()
    Transfer the selected topping from selectedView t0 toppingView Delete the selected topping from selectedView

    If any Transfer ALL from selectedView to toppingView Delete ALL from selectedView

      public BuildController()

  • Method Details

    • setMainButton

      public void setMainButton()
      Set everything to default value

    • getMyOrder

      public void getMyOrder() throws java.io.IOException
      Will call the method display() in PopOrderWindow class It will pop up a new window!
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if JavaFX throws an IOException

    • setPizzaStyle

      public void setPizzaStyle()
      Will use a ObservableList to set value to StyleComboBox

    • setPizzaSize

      public void setPizzaSize()
      Will use a ObservableList to set value to SizeComboBox

    • defaultTopping

      public void defaultTopping()
      It uses the value from the pizzaStyleBox The get value will be compared and will set the topping value on Selected View, and Topping View accordingly

    • blockTopping

      public void blockTopping() throws java.lang.Exception
      Deluxe, and Hawaiian Pizza are special pizza! Helper method for default error. This method stops user from add or removing toppings when the user chooses this pizza.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if the user tries to remove a topping from a static topping pizza.

    • addTopping

      public void addTopping()
      Transfer the selected topping from toppingView to selectedView Delete the selected topping from toppingView

    • removeTopping

      public void removeTopping()
      Transfer the selected topping from selectedView t0 toppingView Delete the selected topping from selectedView

    • setClearSelection

      public void setClearSelection() throws java.lang.NullPointerException
      If any Transfer ALL from selectedView to toppingView Delete ALL from selectedView
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when there is nothing to clear.

    • setFinalAdd

      public void setFinalAdd()
      Finalize the order. If every expectation is matched add the pizza to the Order object else throw an Exception as needed

    • printError

      public void printError​(java.lang.String msg)
